pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## Microsoft Azure SDK for PythonThis package is no longer being maintained. Use the [azure-monitor-query](https://pypi.org/project/azure-monitor-query/) package instead.For migration instructions, see the [migration guide](https://aka.ms/azsdk/python/migrate/ai-to-monitor-query).# Release History## 0.1.1 (2022-02-11)* This package is no longer maintained. Use the [azure-monitor-query](https://pypi.org/project/azure-monitor-query/) package instead.## 0.1.0 (2018-07-11)- Initial Release
